Paris

  • Last updated on April 17, 2022
  • Created on October 2, 2018

Where I stay

Whenever we go to Paris, we stay at Grand Pigalle Hôtel. The staff is friendly but not too friendly, the room service is awesome, and the rooms are the perfect accessory to pretending you’re a Parisian for a few days.

Where I eat

  • One benefit of Grand Pigalle that cannot be overlooked is the fact that it’s across from Buvette
  • As a person who loves Japanese milk bread (if you don’t, God help you), I never miss out on a visit to Carré Pain de Mie

Notes linking here
